channel.title: Exit 36 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Exit 36 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-91 North At I-15
item.description: US-91 north approaching I-15. I-15/US-91 north to Arimo and Pocatello. Continue over overpass for I-15 South to Salt Lake (Utah) and Hawkins Road. US-91 north joins I-15 north to Pocatello.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 36 - N. Franklin Blvd./Murphy. The exit text was changed in 2007 from Franklin Blvd.

item.title: US-91 North at I-15 Ramp
item.description: US-91 north at I-15 onramp. Merge right for I-15 north - continue straight for I-15 south.

item.title: US-91 North At I-15
item.description: US-91 north approaching I-15. US-91 north joins I-15 here. I-15/US-91 north to Arimo and Pocatello. Continue over overpass for I-15 South to Salt Lake and Hawkins Road.

item.title: I-15 North Offramp at US-91
item.description: I-15 north offramp at US-91 to Virginia. Turn left for Hawkins Road. US-91 joins I-15 north here to Pocatello.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 35 Approaching Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 35 - Northside Blvd. Approaching Exit 36 - N Franklin Blvd.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 36 Approaching Exit 35
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 36 - N. Franklin Blvd. Approaching Exit 35 - Northside Blvd.

item.title: I-86 East Exit 36
item.description: I-86 east at Exit 36, BL-86/ID-37 Jct

item.title: I-84 East Exits 35 and Exit 36
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 35 - ID-55/Nampa Blvd./Marsing and Exit 36 - Franklin Blvd. ID-55 has since been relocated to Exit 33. The new exit text for Exit 35 is Northside Blvd. Exit 36 is now Franklin Blvd./Murphy

item.title: BL-86 West at I-86/US-30/ID-37
item.description: BL-86 west approaching I-86/US-30. Continue over freeway for ID-37 south.
